Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| behavioral seizure |
| pilocarpine-induced behavioral seizure |

The paragraph does not mention any disease entities other than "behavioral seizure" and "pilocarpine-induced behavioral seizure". "Seizure" is a disease, but it is not a valid entity in this context since it is not mentioned as is. "Pilocarpine" is not a disease, it's a drug. "MK-801" is also not a disease, it's a drug.

| behavioral seizure |

The paragraph only mentions "behavioral seizure" as a disease entity. "Pilocarpine-induced behavioral seizure" is not a valid entity since "pilocarpine" is a drug and not a disease. "MK-801" is also not a disease, it's a drug.

Therefore, the table above presents the only valid disease entity mentioned in the paragraph, which is "behavioral seizure".
